sources.note: Homepage — describes product as 'Full-service EHR vendor, billers, developers, and programmers'. Cloud-based, browser-based. CEO quote about browser-based operation. CEO: Ignacio Valdes, MD, MS.

About page — founded 2009, serves inpatient/outpatient/PHP. Focus on psychiatry. 34K patient records. Employee-owned. 4-5 named staff. VistA heritage mentioned via team bios (George Welch worked on VistA surgery, scheduling, billing). Houston TX based.
Why Switch page — lists features: Touch Note™, List Signaling™, Turbo Supervision™, templates, prescribing. Testimonial from Jennifer Lableu, NP. Financial/training/productivity/technology benefits.

Full disclosures page with certified criteria list, CQM list, additional software (NewCrop), MFA use cases, and complete API documentation. API shows data sections: allergies, documents, immunizations, encounters, procedures, social, medications, problems, labs, vitals, evaluations. CDA generated by WorldVistA Opensource CDA Documents Generator. Reveals VistA/CPRS heritage.

News page 1 — Meaningful Use certification Feb 2022, board certification of CEO 2021, integrated billing announced July 2020, COVID-19 codes July 2020, Hurricane Harvey uptime Sept 2017, full virtualization July 2017 (formerly astronautvista.com), PHP/CMHC templates Feb 2017, integrated scheduling Feb 2017.

News page 2 — Speed records Nov 2016, Rocket Note™ Nov 2016, Washington County Behavioral Health customer Oct 2016, consents feature Sept 2016, Turbo Supervision 2.0 Aug 2016, scheduling/billing improvements July 2016, NP Care customer June 2016, Kinghaven PHP customer June 2016, MSP-Healthcare (AZ) customer Apr 2016, inpatient billing lists Jan 2016.

News page 3 — Daystars PHP customer Jan 2016, national eRx network migration Dec 2015 (George Lilly/Newcrop/Oroville), Turbo Supervision Dec 2015, vCardDAV demographics drag-and-drop Nov 2015, telemed support Nov 2015, ICD-10 support Oct 2015, PA/NP supervision workflows Aug 2015, Pennsylvania and Oregon operations 2015.
FHIR Base URLs page — download link for CSV of FHIR base URLs.
g(10) API page — download link for SMART on FHIR API documentation.
Old domain — redirects 301 to astronautehr.com. Confirms the former branding as 'Astronaut VistA'.
Attempted — G2 returned bot verification wall. Could not access reviews.
Attempted — Capterra returned Cloudflare bot verification wall. Could not access reviews.
